title: I was NOT in the wrong here (14 day suspension)
body:
and **NO ONE** can convince me otherwise, i was getting flamed by this EXTREMELY toxic premade who went far enough to threaten me with death. Despite all of their insults i did not throw A SINGLE insult back, yes i'm not the most positive person to set foot into existence but i wasn't 1/10 as toxic as they were and i'm the one who is punished in this case? Riot has such a flawed system that can't see the truly toxic people. 

And for those of you saying, "just mute them" NO. I will not mute someone and just get over it after i get violated, i have always been like this and will always remain the same. You can choose to be the bully victim.** I WILL NOT. 
**
Game 1
AbyssalSino : ahri ult
AbyssalSino : you killed my double
AbyssalSino : with that tp
AbyssalSino : i had them both
AbyssalSino : please help me
AbyssalSino : i needed help too when they came 4 mid
AbyssalSino : where were you then
AbyssalSino : you know i was just going to say the exact same thing about you
AbyssalSino : what a coincidence
AbyssalSino : poor boy
AbyssalSino : learn to follow up and i will do the same
AbyssalSino : this is why i dont follow up
AbyssalSino : and i won't do it again
AbyssalSino : i mean brother
AbyssalSino : i just saw how you flashed on evelynn
AbyssalSino : and still failed to get the kill
AbyssalSino : pretty ironic to call others bad
AbyssalSino : evelynn remember when trundle flashed on you?
AbyssalSino : well yeah trundle is flaming me and calling me bad
AbyssalSino : if you call this crying go ahead
AbyssalSino : can you report our toxic duo thanks
AbyssalSino : leona what did you do there lol
AbyssalSino : idk, do you?
AbyssalSino : how is this crying
AbyssalSino : explain that
AbyssalSino : gj leona
AbyssalSino : 0/5
AbyssalSino : dont die?
AbyssalSino : they're flaming me
AbyssalSino : enjoy your reports
AbyssalSino : ur the one toxic
AbyssalSino : tristana lol
AbyssalSino : where were u
AbyssalSino : no i mean when we were on the turret
AbyssalSino : we could've have got inhib
AbyssalSino : can you take a moment to realize that your follow up
AbyssalSino : cost mid turret and inhib
AbyssalSino : ?
AbyssalSino : decisions decisions
AbyssalSino : ty
AbyssalSino : thats a death threat
AbyssalSino : enjoy ur report
AbyssalSino : enjoy ur ban
AbyssalSino : death threats are insta bans
AbyssalSino : trundle threatening me with death
AbyssalSino : where is he lol
AbyssalSino : congratz lowlife premade standing up for eachother
AbyssalSino : what a surprise
AbyssalSino : someone loan this kid a dictionary
AbyssalSino : so he can see what crying means

1. They both threatened to kill me, and both denied and stood up for eachother in ALL chat. Was in the wrong here to call them lowlives? That's the truth. 

2. Kept saying i was crying through the entire game, i asked someone to loan the kid a dictionary. Not an insult. 

3. I was pretty friendly with that guy, really. I got ganked mid, he got worried and TP'd to scare them off. All i said was i had that double if he didn't use his TP to scare them off. 

4. I followed up and died, and was apparently reported for intentionally feeding. Isn't it normal to not want to follow up again? 

5. He was calling me bad through the entire game and i thought i'd point out a misplay he made. Nobodys perfect. 

6. He mentioned my KDA and i mentioned that his wasn't way better.

7. They were trying to the turn the other two teammates against me, couldn't just let that happen. They were the ones who were toxic. 

8. Real life death threats is the maximum level of toxic. Should results in a ban in EVERY SINGLE GAME.

>They both threatened to kill me, and both denied and stood up for eachother in ALL chat. Was in the wrong here to call them lowlives? That's the truth.

When talking about your punishment it doesn't matter what everyone else did only what you did as you are responsible for your own actions.

Ans while it may very well be the truth it is still a insult.

>Kept saying i was crying through the entire game, i asked someone to loan the kid a dictionary. Not an insult.

Calling someone a kid is a insult when used in a derogatory way as you did.  It also directly attacks the persons intellect when you say they need a dictionary.

>I was pretty friendly with that guy, really. I got ganked mid, he got worried and TP'd to scare them off. All i said was i had that double if he didn't use his TP to scare them off.

You might think that.  However it doesn't mean that everyone else does.  I personally found it to be nothing more then blaming and attacking.


>I followed up and died, and was apparently reported for intentionally feeding. Isn't it normal to not want to follow up again?

I never said you have to follow up.   However flat out telling your team you will not help is very negative.


>He was calling me bad through the entire game and i thought i'd point out a misplay he made. Nobodys perfect.

I don't care what they did/say.   That has no bearing on your punishments.   You are only punished for your actions.

>He mentioned my KDA and i mentioned that his wasn't way better.

I don't care what they did/say.   That has no bearing on your punishments.   You are only punished for your actions.

>They were trying to the turn the other two teammates against me, couldn't just let that happen. They were the ones who were toxic.

So?   1 report is the same as 9.  Just because someone else is toxic doesn't make it okay for you to be......

>Real life death threats is the maximum level of toxic. Should results in a ban in EVERY SINGLE GAME.

Actually they are taken very seriously.   And they do result in perma bans.   No one os excusing the other players behavior.   It just doesn't matter when addressing yours.   You are responsible for your actions they are responsible for theirs.   As long as they are reported it will be addressed.   If you are in any way worried you can always report these type of threats via a support ticket as well.

You can choose to mute them, or you can choose to get permanently banned if you keep it up.

You say you won't be convinced you were wrong. Alright, I won't try and convince you you were wrong.

<removed by moderation>

You don't need to mock and insult them, that just helps ensure no constructive discussion ever takes place, so I've removed your last comment. Try to give them respect whether they've earned it or not.

If you have questions or concerns about this action please visit us in the [Moderation Discord here.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)

I'm a human being, i get angry, i get upset. Human things. I believe that i was wrongly punished, i get real life death threats thrown my way and people are acting as if i was in the wrong here.
Both parties can be wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=AbyssalSino ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=EMyRIgWB,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2017-09-02T22:29:40.784+0000)

We're all human, every single player on LoL is a human.  That said, those who are toxic enough to reach the 14 day ban make up a tiny portion of that population.  And, if you keep up this behavior, you'll soon be part of the even more tiny portion of players that reach permaban.
I don't mean to nitpick........but only 98-99% of player on LoL is a human.  We cannot deny the existence of level-up bots in vs AI and ARAM

A game where a chat exists and communication is key, you come here with the argument. "Permanently mute everyone or get permanently banned yourself" Argument invalid. Your logic is just as flawed as your very existence.

No, I never said that.

I said you can choose to mute and not respond to people flaming you, or you can choose to retaliate and get permanently banned.

That was a direct response to this that you said:

>NO. I will not mute someone and just get over it after i get violated, i have always been like this and will always remain the same. You can choose to be the bully victim. I WILL NOT. 

You are free to take that route. But you will find yourself permanently suspended, I suspect very shortly after your 14 day ban expires.

----
Oh, and by the way, being toxic towards people on the boards will just result in at best a boards suspension and at worst a Rioter coming here and increasing your ban in game to permanent as it's obvious you aren't changing your attitude. It's happened before.
